title: West Wash Park Charm!!
posting_body: 23-33 Pearl is situated just off the business of South Broadway while still less than a mile from Wash Park.
The little local community positions you perfectly for breakfast at Waffle Brothers, or an arcade
The homes feature hardwood floors, a quaint courtyard with grilling stations, and ceiling fans in the bedrooms.
Additional Storage • Bike Racks • Central Courtyard • Controlled Access • Laundry Facility •
On-Site Laundry • Pet Friendly • Reserved Parking • Online Payments Available • Smoke-Free Community •
In Guarantee Apartment Amenities Additional Storage • Air Conditioner •
Ceiling Fan • Closet organizers • Dishwasher • Granite Counter Tops • Hardwood Floors •
